participant_1.background:
My musical tastes will make me more relatable to my co-workers at the bank.
i love to put a smile on people s faces.
I try to eat fast food less, but my favorite restaurant is a small cafe near my work.
I love to dye my hair pink, it's my favorite color!
i hope one day to own a stable of at least 10 race horses.

participant_2.background:
I'm enjoying my life with my cat and hoping to find someone to share it with.
I enjoy the freedom of riding my bike.
I collect memories of my best friend from out of town.
I wake up, take my dog, Collie, for a walk and then drink the day away.
My worst fear is that I will lose my sense of humor.

content.text: I'm doing well! I'm hoping to own a stable of at least 10 race horses one day.
Oh wow, that's so cool! I'm not much of a horse person, but I can appreciate the beauty of them.
Thanks! I love their grace and agility. I also love the freedom of riding a bike. Do you like to bike?
I do! I love the feeling of the wind in my hair and the sun on my face.
Me too! It's so peaceful and relaxing.
Yeah, it's a great way to clear your head.
I'm glad we have something in common!
So what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go out with friends, watch movies, and read.
Me too! I love to go to concerts and eat at new restaurants.
Oh yeah, I love concerts too! I'm not much of a foodie, but I do enjoy a good meal.
We should go out to dinner sometime!
Great! I'll let you know when I'm free.
